title: Village on the Yarra
creator_credit: Peter Bence, Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: State Historian, Dr. Bernard Barrett talks about early Melbourne, the first landing parties in the Melbourne areas and the events leading up to its establishment on the banks of the Yarra.
